name: Mouse Trail Free
author: Fernando Miranda

sections.description:
Enhance your website with a captivating mouse trail effect that follows your visitors’ cursors.

Key Features:
– Basic Mouse Trail Effect: Add an elegant mouse trail that enhances your site’s interactivity.
– Free Customization Options: Choose the trail’s color and enable or disable it as needed.

Unlock Premium Features:
Upgrade to the Premium Version for advanced customization:
– Control trail thickness, opacity, length, and speed.
– Add stunning gradient effects.

Take your mouse trail effects to the next level with the premium version!
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/mouse-trail-free/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Configure your settings under Settings > Mouse Trail Options.
sections.faq:
How do I enable the mouse trail?

After activating the plugin, go to Settings > Mouse Trail Options and enable it.

Can I change the color of the mouse trail in the free version?

Yes, you can choose a basic color for the trail in the free version.

What additional features does the premium version offer?

The premium version offers full customization including control over the thickness, length, opacity, speed, and the ability to add gradient effects.
sections.changelog:
1.4

  • Basic trail customization (color, enable/disable).
  • Updated UI for plugin settings.
